attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-0475

Date: 2014-04-28

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration of Ken Sandhu, Deputy Chairperson and Member, Refugee Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, at the rate set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective June 13, 2013 until such time as a Chairperson is designated.

 


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil fixe la rémunération de Ken Sandhu, vice-président et commissaire, section d'appel des réfugiés de la Commission de l'immigration et du statut de réfugié, pour la période pendant laquelle il agit à titre de président, conformément à l’annexe ci-jointe, lequel traitement se situe dans l = échelle GCQ 8 (228 400 $ - 268 700 $), commençant le 13 juin 2013 jusqu’à ce qu’un président soit nommé.

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration of Ken Sandhu, Deputy Chairperson and Member, Refugee Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, at the rate set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective June 13, 2013 until such time as a Chairperson is designated.

échelle GCQ 8 (228 400 $ - 268 700 $), commençant le 13 juin 2013 jusqu’à ce qu’un président soit nommé.
